message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this exceptional product.  Given its value, I believe a starting price of $950,000 is fair. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850,000. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Bob, I understand your perspective, but the value of this product is truly significant. I could consider coming down to $920,000. This is a very competitive offer considering its worth.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $860,000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
Bob, I'm sensing we're getting closer. Let's make this happen - I can go as low as $890,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $830,000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
